content.description:
Voice message

Selection plays two times.
content.question: What is the reason for the change of plans?

choices.label: The basketball team needs to use the gym.
The dance team’s competition has been rescheduled.
The teacher needs to go to another school for an event.

content.answer: The basketball team needs to use the gym.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
